Welcome to Not-So-TUF

Not So TUF aka Not So Tough Update Framework! NST trades a little security for ease of use. Still very secure as long as you keep your private key secure :)

This framework does most of the heavy lifting regarding updating your app or library. NST will scan your update binary, grab meta-data from filename & get checksums, make patches get patch checksums, update version file, sign version file with private key, backs up packages to files folder then moves all packages to deploy folder ready for upload. All from the cli or programmatically. Oh and NST handles the creation of your public and private keys. Your keys will be place in keys folder.
